sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-menu
        offset-y>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-btn
                class="grey--texttext-capitalize"
                text
                v-bind="attrs"
                v-on="on">
                Phases
            </v-btn>
        </template>

        <v-list>
            <v-list-item
                v-for="(phase, index) in phases"
                :key="index"
                @click="menuActionClick(phase)">
                <v-list-item-title>{{ phase.name }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
    </v-menu>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PhaseMenu',
    props: {
        phases: Array
    },
    data() {
        return {
            items: [
                { title: 'Click Me' },
                { title: 'Click Me' },
                { title: 'Click Me' },
                { title: 'Click Me 2' },
            ],
        }
    },
    computed: {
        selectedPlan: {
            get() {
                return this.$store.state.selectedPlan
            }
        },
    },
    methods: {
        menuActionClick(phase) {
            // this.$emit('open-phase-card', phase)
        }
    }

}
</script>
